column4: Hi guys... firefox 3.5.2 has started crashing suddenly on my Jaunty with an illegal instruction/segmentation fault error.... this happened once earlier also... and my system finally hung.... reboot however fixes the issue.. any idea what might be wrong?

Hi guys... firefox 3.5.2 has started crashing suddenly on my Jaunty with an illegal instruction/segmentation fault error.... this happened once earlier also... and my system finally hung.... reboot however fixes the issue.. any idea what might be wrong? [sorry for pasting again.. but this problem is driving me nuts]
systematic approach... try a fresh profile and see if some addon is misbehaving
so run firefox from a terminal to see error messages
